data.text: Wo xa Alatala matɔxɔ.
Nde Alatala xa wali xungbe masenma,
Sɛɛwɛ na tinxintɔɛe bɛ,
Alatala, i xa ratu n ma i hinnɛma i xa ɲama ra tɛmui naxɛ,
alako n xa i xa mixi sugandixie xa hɛri sɔtɔ,
Muxu bara yunubi raba alɔ muxu benbae,
Muxu benbae to nu na Misira bɔxi ma,
Kɔnɔ a naxa e rakisi a xili xa fe ra,
A to xaaɲɛ Xulunyumi baa ma, a naxa xɔri,
A naxa e rakisi e xɔnmixie bɛlɛxɛ i,
Ye naxa dusu e yaxuie xun na,
Na kui e naxa la a xa masenyi ra, e a matɔxɔ bɛɛti ra.
Kɔnɔ a mu bu, e man naxa nɛɛmu a xa walie ma,
E naxa bira e yɛtɛ waxɔnfe fɔxɔ ra gbengberenyi ma,
A naxa e waxɔnse so e yi ra,
Ala xa ɲama naxa Munsa nun Haruna tɔɔnɛ,
Bɔxi naxa a rabi,
Tɛ naxa e fɔxirabirɛ ɲaaxie gan.
E naxa ninge misaali yailan wure ra,
Ninge naxan sɛxɛ donma,
E naxa nɛɛmu e Rakisima Ala ma,
naxan kaabanakoee raba Hami bɔxi ma,
Ala nu wama e sɔntɔfe,
E naxa tondi a xa bɔxi fanyi suxude, e mu la a xa laayidi ra.
E naxa ti Alatala kanke e xa kiri banxie kui, e mu a xui suxu.
Na kui a naxa laayidi tongo e bɛ,
a xa e bɔnsɔɛ faxa ɲamanɛe tagi,
E naxa Bali Peyori batu,
E naxa Ala raxɔnɔ e xa fe kobie ra,
Finexasi to keli, a naxa Ala maxandi e bɛ,
Mixi naxa na tinxinyi kolon a bɛ abadan.
Alatala xa ɲama naxa a raxɔnɔ Meriba xure fɛ ma.
a to wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ fala e xa Ala matandi xa fe ra.
E mu Kanaan sie sɔntɔ alɔ Alatala e yamari ki naxɛ.
E naxa sabati e ya ma, e bira e naamunyie fɔxɔ ra.
E naxa nee xa kuyee batu, na fa findi gantanyi ra e bɛ.
E naxa e xa di xɛmɛe nun e xa di ginɛ ba sɛrɛxɛ ra ɲinnɛe bɛ.
E to e xa die faxa sɛrɛxɛ ra Kanaan xa kuyee bɛ,
E e yɛtɛ findi mixi sɛniyɛntare ra na ki nɛ,
Na kui Alatala naxa xɔnɔ a xa ɲama ma,
A naxa e rabolo si gbɛtɛe yi ra,
E yaxuie naxa nɔ e ra,
Sanya wuyaxi Ala naxa e rakisi,
Kɔnɔ Ala naxa e tɔɔrɛ to,
A naxa ratu a xa saatɛ ma,
A naxa a niya mixie xa kinikini e ma konyiya kui.
Muxu Marigi Alatala, muxu rakisi.
Tantui na Isirayila Marigi Alatala bɛ abadan!
